Structs/Failable.html#/s:10Validation8Fa.name: value
Structs/Failable.html#/s:10Validation8Fa.abstract: The underlaying value that has been validated.

Structs/ValidationError.html#/s:10Valida.name: identifier
Structs/ValidationError.html#/s:10Valida.abstract: The machine readable ID for the error.

Structs/ValidationError.html#/s:10Valida.name: reason
Structs/ValidationError.html#/s:10Valida.abstract: The human readable reason that the error occured.

Structs/ValidationError.html.name: ValidationError
Structs/ValidationError.html.abstract: An error that occurs while validating a value.

Structs/Failable.html.name: Failable
Structs/Failable.html.abstract: A type that can fail when being set because the new value does pass certain validations.

Structs/NotNil.html.name: NotNil
Structs/NotNil.html.abstract: Verified that a value is not equal to nil.

Structs/NotNilValidate.html.name: NotNilValidate
Structs/NotNilValidate.html.abstract: Validates a value if it is not nil. If the value is nil, the validation is skipped.

Protocols/RegexValidation.html#/s:10Vali.name: pattern
Protocols/RegexValidation.html#/s:10Vali.abstract: The regular expression pattern to match values against.

Protocols/InRangeValidation.html#/s:10Va.name: max
Protocols/InRangeValidation.html#/s:10Va.abstract: The maximum value that the value being validated could be.

Protocols/InRangeValidation.html#/s:10Va.name: min
Protocols/InRangeValidation.html#/s:10Va.abstract: The miniumum value that the value being validated could be.

Protocols/ElementValidation.html#/s:10Va.name: validator
Protocols/ElementValidation.html#/s:10Va.abstract: The function used to validate each element in the sequence.

Protocols/LengthValidation.html#/s:10Val.name: maxLength
Protocols/LengthValidation.html#/s:10Val.abstract: The maximum length that the validated collection can have.

Protocols/LengthValidation.html#/s:10Val.name: minLength
Protocols/LengthValidation.html#/s:10Val.abstract: The minimum length that the validated collection can have.

Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.name: Supported
Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.abstract: The type that this validation can validate.

Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.name: validate(_:)
Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.abstract: A type-safe method for validating a new value for a Failable instance.

Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.name: safeSubvalidations
Protocols/Validation.html#/s:10Validatio.abstract: Subvalidations that expect an input type that matches the validation’s Support type.

Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.name: type
Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.abstract: The type that is expected as input for the validate method.

Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.name: subvalidations
Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.abstract: Validations that should also be run on a new value, besides the main validation.

Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.name: validate(_:)
Protocols/AnyValidation.html#/s:10Valida.abstract: Validates the value passed in. The an unexpected type is received, the ValidationError.invalidType will be thrown.

Protocols/Validation.html.name: Validation
Protocols/Validation.html.abstract: A type that can be used to validate a new value for a Failable type.

Protocols/LengthValidation.html.name: LengthValidation
Protocols/LengthValidation.html.abstract: A validation type that verifies the length of a type conforming to Collection.

Protocols/ElementValidation.html.name: ElementValidation
Protocols/ElementValidation.html.abstract: Validates each element in a sequence using a custom validation function.

Protocols/InRangeValidation.html.name: InRangeValidation
Protocols/InRangeValidation.html.abstract: A validation for checking that a value is greater or equal to a lesser value and less than or equal to a greater value.

Protocols/RegexValidation.html.name: RegexValidation
Protocols/RegexValidation.html.abstract: Checks that a String value contains a match to a regular expression pattern somewhere in it.

Functions.html#/s:10Validation2ltoiyyAA8.abstract: Sets the stored value of a Failable type.

Extensions/CustomStringConvertible.html#.name: failable(_:)
Extensions/CustomStringConvertible.html#.abstract: Easily create Failable versions of types conforming to CustomStringConvertible. This includes most, if not all, core Swift types.
